document_data.mainbody:
ugg was a Cashguard Basher in the employ of the Counting House of Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
Dugg was a human man with pale skin, trimmed beard, and long straight black hair. As a Cashguard Basher, he wore a set of uniform plate mail armor and a helmet. Dugg was armed with a two-handed war hammer.
In the , Cashguard Basher Dugg was tasked with guarding and patrolling the private docks that belonged to the Counting House in the Lower City, alongside a number of fellow Cashguards and the citys steel watchers.
